U

unescapeHtml() - Method in class de.db.derpate.util.StringEscapeUtilTest
 
unescapeHtml(String) - Static method in class de.db.derpate.util.StringEscapeUtil
Unescapes a String containing entity escapes to a string containing the actual Unicode characters corresponding to the escapes.
For example:
&quot;max&quot; &amp; &quot;mustermann&quot;
becomes:
"max" & "mustermann"
If an entity is unrecognized, it is left alone, and inserted verbatim into the result string.
unescapeJson(String) - Static method in class de.db.derpate.util.StringEscapeUtil
Unescapes any Json literals found in the String.
update(E) - Method in interface de.db.derpate.persistence.Dao
Updates an already existing entity
update(HttpSession, LoginUser) - Method in class de.db.derpate.manager.LoginManager
Updates the user connected with the session.
The id and type of user have to be the same!

UUID_PATTERN - Static variable in class de.db.derpate.util.InputVerifyUtil
Pattern to validate a Universally Unique Identifier.
A uuid may follow the following pattern: xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx (x standing for hexadecimal characters)
